name: relight
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to begin to burn again; to make something begin to burn again: If no gas leak is detected, relight your heater.
More examplesFewer examplesA failure to relight suggests a blocked jet, which needs cleaning and adjusting.I just relit the furnace after waiting 3.5 hours for a plumber who still hasn't shown up.He had been trying to relight the firework after it had failed to go off at a public display.Castro explained that you never relight a cigar. When it goes out, you throw it away.
